GINCCO_lib.heatmap_plot module¶

GINCCO_lib.heatmap_plot.plot_heatmap(title, tstart, tend, data_draw, depth, path_save='.', name_save='figure', n_colors=100)[source]¶

Time–depth heatmap with pcolormesh. - Colormap: jet, BoundaryNorm with n_colors bins. - Color range: 5th to 95th percentile. - Colorbar: horizontal with 4–7 nice ticks. - X ticks: daily / monthly / yearly depending on span. - Output filename: name_save + “_” + random number + “.png”

GINCCO_lib.heatmap_plot.plot_section(title, data_draw, depth_array, lon_min, lon_max, lat_min, lat_max, path_save='.', name_save='figure', n_colors=100, n_ticks=5)[source]¶

Time–depth heatmap with pcolormesh. - Colormap: jet, BoundaryNorm with n_colors bins. - Color range: 5th to 95th percentile. - Colorbar: horizontal with 4–7 nice ticks. - X ticks: daily / monthly / yearly depending on span. - Output filename: name_save + “_” + random number + “.png”
